recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions
While pasta cooks, crisp the pancetta in a large pan
Beat eggs with grated cheese and pepper in a bowl
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water
Combine hot pasta with pancetta, then quickly stir in egg mixture
Add pasta water if needed for creaminess
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables into even pieces
Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch for sauce
Heat oil in a wok or large frying pan
Remove chicken and cook vegetables until crisp-tender
Return chicken to pan and add sauce
